fieldUpdates.name: Clear Current Queue Value in Problem

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(CH_RecordTypeDevName__c ='CH_Problem', LEFT(CH_ProblemStatement__c + ' ' + CH_Product_Name__c + ' ' + CH_Product_Release__r.Name + ' ' + CH_SW_Component__c + ' ' + CH_SW_Release_Name__c , 32000), LEFT(CH_Product_Name__c + ' ' + CH_Product_Release_Name__c + ' ' + CH_CustomerDescription__c + ' ' + CH_IssueDescription__c + ' ' + CH_InitialDiagnosis__c + ' ' + CH_TemporarySolution__c , 32000))
fieldUpdates.name: CH Concatenate Values

fieldUpdates.formula: CH_TemporarySolution__c + ' ' + CH_ProblemStatement__c + ' ' + CH_InitialDiagnosis__c + ' ' + CH_CustomerDescription__c + ' ' + CH_TechnicalAnalysis__c + ' ' + CH_Product_Name__c + ' ' + Product.Id + ' '+CH_Product_Release__r.Name +''+ CH_IssueDescription__c
fieldUpdates.name: CH_Concatenate values

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( ISCHANGED( CH_SystemRestored__c ), ISPICKVAL( CH_Outage__c , 'Yes') ), CH_SystemRestored__c,CH_OutageEndDate__c)
fieldUpdates.name: CH OED Action

fieldUpdates.description: Changing case Owner team to Tier HCL 3
fieldUpdates.name: Owner Team

fieldUpdates.name: Update As Auto Approve By System "False"

rules.description: This is used for Routing All the support tickets to Tier 1 for Europe.
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Type,"sCRM Problem"), ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"Access/Visibility"), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,"Market Europe") )

rules.description: This is used to route the SF tickets to the India Tier 1 queue.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'Access/Visibility'), ISPICKVAL(Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market India') )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'Access/Visibility'), ISPICKVAL (Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'MARKET LATIN AMERICA'))

rules.description: This is used to route the SF tickets to the MEA Tier 1 queue.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'Access/Visibility'), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market Middle East and Africa') )

rules.description: This is used to route the SF tickets to the NAM Tier 1 queue.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'Access/Visibility'), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market North America') )

rules.description: This is used for Routing All the support tickets to Tier 1 for APJ
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"sCRM Problem"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", OR ( ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"General Issue") || ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"Reporting")|| ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"Access/Visibility") ), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , "Market Asia Pacific & Japan") )

rules.description: This is used for Routing All the support tickets to Tier 1 for Europe
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"sCRM Problem"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", OR ( ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"General Issue") || ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"Reporting") ), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,"Market Europe") )

rules.description: This workflow rule assigns all types of support tickets to greater china queue.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"sCRM Problem"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", OR ( ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"General Issue") || ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"Reporting")|| ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,"Access/Visibility") ), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market Greater China') )

rules.description: Calculates the customer pending time, if the status is set to customer pending.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pending Customer') )

rules.fullName: CH Status Update to Cancelled for Problem Cases
rules.description: NOKIASC-34633 Workflow to set the status of a Problem case automatically to Cancelled and stage to Closed, when the Closure Reason is set to Cancelled.
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED( CH_Closure_Reason__c ) ,RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_Problem', ISPICKVAL(CH_Closure_Reason__c, 'Cancelled'))
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SF_Support', ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,'Security Group'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Services_Project_Team') )
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SF_Support', ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,'User Access'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Services_Project_Team') )
ISBLANK( CH_ReportedDate__c ) && ( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Created'))
AND(LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = "00G", CH_RecordTypeCheck__c = TRUE)

rules.fullName: CH_Concatenate Search Relevant Fields in Description
rules.formula: OR(NOT(ISNULL(CH_InitialDiagnosis__c)), NOT(ISNULL( CH_CustomerDescription__c )), NOT(ISNULL(CH_ProblemStatement__c )), NOT(ISNULL(CH_TemporarySolution__c)), NOT(ISNULL(CH_TechnicalAnalysis__c)), NOT(ISNULL(CH_Product_Name__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Product.Id )),NOT(ISNULL( CH_Product_Release__r.Name )),NOT(ISNULL( CH_IssueDescription__c ))) && CH_RecordTypeCheck__c

criteriaItems.value: Nokia Incident with Restoration,Nokia Information Request,Nokia Standard Case,Problem

rules.description: Workflow to concatenate search relevant fields to Support Ticket Record Types: Nokia Incident with Restoration, Nokia Standard Case and Information Request
Workflow to concatenate search relevant fields to Problem Support Ticket Record Type

rules.fullName: CH_Current Queue Removal When Problem Owner Changes
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), NOT(ISNULL(OwnerId)), NOT(ISBLANK(OwnerId)), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName='CH_Problem', RecordType.DeveloperName='CH_NokiaStandardCase', RecordType.DeveloperName='CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration', RecordType.DeveloperName='CH_NokiaInformationRequest') )

rules.description: If value of Entitlement Exception is "No Exception" and Entitlement Status is not populated, then system is to set Entitlement Status value to "Entitled (Automated)"
If value of Entitlement Exception is "Not Applicable", then Entitlement Status is to always be set to "Not Applicable"

If value of Entitlement Exception is ( "Account Not Listed" or "Covered Product Asset Not Listed" or "Entitlement Not Listed") and Entitlement Status is not populated, then system is to set Entitlement Status value to "Pending CAPM Review"
If value of Entitlement Exception is "Entitlement Script Verified Manually" and Entitlement Status is not populated, then system is to set Entitlement Status value to "Entitled (Manually Verified)"

If value of Entitlement Exception is "Entitlement Script Verification Required" and Entitlement Status is not populated, then system is to set Entitlement Status value to "Pending Manual Entitlement Script Verification"

rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SF_Support', ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,'General Issues'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Services_Project_Team'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,'Market North America'), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,'Market Latin America')) )

AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SF_Support', ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,'General Issues'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Services_Project_Team'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,'Market Greater China'), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,'Market India'), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,'Market Asia Pacific & Japan')) )

AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SF_Support', ISPICKVAL(Category__c ,'General Issues'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Services_Project_Team'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,'Market Middle East and Africa'), ISPICKVAL( Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c ,'Market Europe')) )

OR(AND(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_NokiaInformationRequest', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_NokiaStandardCase' ) , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'),CH_LegacyCaseNumber__c=null), AND(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_NokiaInformationRequest', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_NokiaStandardCase' ) , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'),$Label.CH_Enable_Completion_of_Legacy_Cases='Yes',CH_LegacyCaseNumber__c!=null))

rules.description: Outage End Date only filled in only for the Support Tickets with "Outage" : "Yes" and NOKIASC-27404:Restored Date is changed.
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISCHANGED( CH_SystemRestored__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration", (ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , 'Critical') || ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , 'Major')), ISPICKVAL( CH_Outage__c , 'Yes') ), AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration", ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , 'Critical'), ISPICKVAL( CH_Outage__c , 'No')) , AND((RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaStandardCase"), (ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , "Critical") || ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , "Major")), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(CH_Outage__c), "Yes") && ISPICKVAL( CH_Outage__c , "No"))) )

rules.description: For Critical Case without Outage, Outage End Date is not auto-populated.
rules.formula: OR( AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration", ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , 'Critical'), ISPICKVAL( CH_Outage__c , 'No')) , AND((RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaStandardCase"), (ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , "Critical") || ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , "Major")), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(CH_Outage__c), "Yes") && ISPICKVAL( CH_Outage__c , "No"))) )

rules.description: When Cases changed from Outage to Non-Outage ( Major or Critical)
rules.formula: AND((RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "CH_NokiaStandardCase"), (ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , "Critical") || ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , "Major")), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(CH_Outage__c), "Yes") && ISPICKVAL( CH_Outage__c , "No")))

rules.description: This rules helps in updating a flag which will be used in validation to make R&D field on Case as read only

rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Severity__c , 'Minor') || ISPICKVAL(Severity__c, 'Information Request')
NOT(ISBLANK( CH_ReportedDate__c ))

rules.description: To update Assessed outage field based on Outage field when set to No.
To update Assessed Outage field based on outage field when set to Yes
Workflow updating Duration open to routed field, when article is routed to a corresponding queue
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId)))
ISCHANGED(Severity__c)
ISCHANGED(Status)

rules.description: Changing the owner name
The request is cancelled by the requestor or it's not withing scope of CSR process.
GSS SPOC contact is assigned to work with the request.
rules.formula: AND( ISBLANK(Date_Time_GSS_SPOC_start__c), RecordType.DeveloperName= "Customer_Security_Request", LEFT(OwnerId, 3 ) = "005", LEFT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId), 3) = "00G")

rules.description: The case ownership is assigend to GSS Security SPOC queue when a new CSR case is created.
Notify contacts when status is "on hold"
Timestamp when a closed or cancelled request is reopened.
The request is escalated to a Security SME queue.
SME response is available and the request is assigned back to GSS SPOC.
Notify GSS users about SME response available
SME contact is assigned to work with the request.
SPOC response or SME response checked by SPOC is available.

rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'On Hold'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Issue Resolved'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Case_Escalation')

rules.description: This is used to route the SF tickets to the MEA Tier 1 queue.

Reminder After Submission of IR Approval Updated
Reminder for BG Approval on creation
Send CaPM Email to Account Owner
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='HWS_Case_Escalation', ISPICKVAL(Status,'On Hold'),ISBLANK(HWS_Capm_Email__c ),NOT(ISNULL( ParentId )))

rules.description: Send IR Application Acceptance Email
rules.formula: Text(Status) == 'Acceptance Email Sent' && TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) == 'Onboarding in progress' && (RecordType.Name == 'Indirect Reseller Application' || RecordType.Name == 'VAR Fast-Track Form')

rules.description: Set As Auto Approve By System False, when Status is not equals to New

rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'User Management Case Support', ISCHANGED(Status), TEXT( Subscribe_Status_Notifications_on_Email__c )='Yes' )

rules.description: Ticket#: 02192102 This WF Rule would send notification to the creator SF support ticket when a Customer General Security Request type of ticket is created.

rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status ,'Ready For User Creation') ,RecordType.Name = 'User Management Case Support')
AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'General Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market Latin America') )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'General Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market Middle East and Africa') )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'General Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market North America') )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'sCRM Problem'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "SF_Support", ISPICKVAL(Category__c,'General Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Issue_Reported_By__r.Market__c , 'Market India') )
